org.hibernate.ogm.datastore.couchdb.dialect.backend.impl

Class CouchDBDatastore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.ogm.datastore.couchdb.dialect.backend.impl.CouchDBDatastore

  • public class CouchDBDatastore
extends Object
    Provides access and interaction with a database instance of CouchDB.
    Author:
    Andrea Boriero <dreborier@gmail.com>, Gunnar Morling

      • getCurrentRevision

        public String getCurrentRevision(String documentId,
                        boolean isDesignDocument)
        Returns the current revision of the document with the given id.
        Parameters:
        documentId - the document's id
        isDesignDocument - whether the given id identifies a design document or not
        Returns:
        the current revision of the specified document or null if no document with the given id exists

      • exists

        public boolean exists(String documentId,
             boolean isDesignDocument)
        Whether the given document exists in the datastore or not.
        Parameters:
        documentId - the id of the document to check
        isDesignDocument - true if it's a DesignDocument
        Returns:
        true if the document exists in the datastore
